events.name: on_ready
events.description: A series of actions that are executed upon bot initiation.

events.name: on_member_join
events.description: A series of actions that are executed upon a new member joining a server. Instructions are executed in the server that the member has joined.
actions: Sends a customizable welcome message to the new member's private messages.
Posts a customizable welcome message to the channel of choice in the server.

events.name: on_member_remove
events.description: A series of actions that are executed upon a member leaving a server.
actions: Sends a customizable farewell message to the new member's private messages.
Posts a customizable welcome message to the channel of choice in the server.

help.name: help
help.description: Opens up the help page. Type any command after help to see it in more detail.

random.name: random
random.description: A random item generator for all your random needs.

arguments.number: Generates a random number between in the inclusive range of the next two inputs. Defaults to [-1000, 1000].
arguments.word: Searches Wikipedia with specified query, returns random image on wiki page.
